product_name: Pro-Tec Athletics Half Round Calf Stretcher
long_description: You need more than a runner's high and recovery drinks to stay in top form. Pro-Tech Athletics Half Round calf stretcher helps you stretch your Achilles and calf muscles, and massage your arches. Half-round foam roller provides stretch to arches, Achilles and calf muscles. Rounded side provides effective massage to arches for plantar fasciitis.
short_description: You need more than a runner's high and recovery drinks to stay in top form. Pro-Tech Athletics Half Round calf stretcher helps you stretch your Achilles and calf muscles, and massage your arches.
